DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study the effect of anticoagulation in immune response with Acute Kidney Injury (AKI) undergoing Continuous Renal Replacement Therapy (CRRT).
DOC.brief_title: Immunomodulation Effect of Regional Citrate Anticoagulation in Acute Kidney Injury Requiring Continuous Renal Replacement Therapy
DOC.criteria: Systemic inflammatory response syndrome; SIRS > or = 2 meets definition Patients with acute kidney injury in the intensive care ward. Requiring continuous renal replacement therapy. Pregnancy Cirrhosis End stage renal disease HIV infection Serum creatinine in male > 2 mg/dl and female > 1.5 mg/dl Bleeding
DOC.keyword: Acute Kidney Injury Requiring Continuous Renal Replacement Therapy
